title: New: abhi//dijon – Twelve
body:
Maryland duo **abhi//dijon** have just shared new track, _Twelve_.

Clocking up an impressive amount of coverage for their previous four tracks, it appears that they’re taking the step up to the next level. _Twelve_ is vaguely reminiscent of Confessions era Usher, and of course Frank Ocean, with it’s sultry, brooding take on R&B.

excerpt.full: Maryland duo abhi//dijon have just shared new track, Twelve. Clocking up an impressive amount of coverage for their previous four tracks, it appears that they’re taking the step up to the next level. Twelve is vaguely reminiscent of Confessions era Usher, and of course Frank Ocean, with it’s sultry, brooding take on R&B.
